mapper.insert: insert into reservation values( seq_reservation.nextval, #{placeNo}, (select host_no from place where no = #{placeNo}), #{guestNo}, #{guestCount}, #{checkinDate}, #{checkoutDate}, #{period}, #{price}, #{statusCode}, #{orderId} )
mapper.select: select r.*, p.name as place_name, p.description, p.checkin_time_start, p.checkin_time_end, p.checkout_time_start, p.checkout_time_end, p.address_Name, p.coord_X, p.coord_Y, p.region_1depth, p.region_2depth, p.region_3depth, p.road_Name, p.main_Building_No, p.sub_Building_No, p.building_Name, m.name as host_name from reservation r left outer join place p on (r.place_no = p.no) left outer join member m on (r.host_no = m.no) where r.no = #{no}
